data.why:
Advanced 'pure perl' Tk widgets.

    Starting with Tk::MatchEntry, an entry widget with user-friendly
    auto-completion modelled after the "recipient" entry fields in
    modern email clients, with significant differences to existing
    widgets (like HistEntry (cpan), JBrowseEntry (cpan) and
    SelectionEntry (comp.lang.perl.tk)). POD online at
    http://www.code-wizards.com/projects/tk-matchentry/Tk-MatchEntry.3.html
    .
